#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(Server)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")

add_executable(Server Server/Server.cpp)
target_link_libraries(Server -L/usr/lib64/mysql/ -ltolua++ -luv -lboost_system -lboost_filesystem -lrabbitmq -lhiredis -lzmq -lmysqlpp -llog4cplus -lluajit-5.1 -lmysqlclient "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG} -g -ggdb -D__DEBUG__")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE} -O2 -g -ggdb")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -w -static-libgcc -std=gnu99")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -w -static-libgcc -std=gnu++11 ")
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH ${CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH} /usr/local/lib64/ /usr/local/lib/ /usr/lib64 /usr/lib)
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG} -g -ggdb -D__DEBUG__")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO} -O2 -g -ggdb")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO} -O2 -g -ggdb")
include_directories(/usr/local/include /usr/include)
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE} -O2 -g -ggdb")
